field.value: Getting Brail to Work in Medium Trust

field.name: description
field.value: Medium trust environments do not like FormatterServices.GetUninitializedObject

comment.author: captainramen
comment.text: replaced it with Activator.CreateInstance Brail and boo will now work in medium trust when you update boo with patches found in BOO-1215

comment.author: roelofb
comment.text:
Thanks for your patch.
Can you see if you can modify the object creation like the DefaultComponentActivator in MicroKernel does? It uses the fast path when not running on medium trust: check FastCreateInstance() in http://svn.castleproject.org:8080/svn/Castle/trunk/InversionOfControl/Castle.MicroKernel/ComponentActivator/DefaultComponentActivator.cs
